attributes.action: Cancel all contracts between Working Links and any government agency (notably DWP and Jc+)  concerning services to the unemployed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the unemployed deserve good services and that Working Links has failed to provide same. This being the case their contarct should be cancelled without payment of any cancellation fee, and they should not be considered for future contracts in any area
